page.title: 14SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY 3
page.content: still being used in research as it is necessary fof farmers to know how much food an animal consumes and with the diet this can be easily monitored. This is the only place in Britain where the Complete Diet is made. VET FIELD STATION AT EASTER BUSH FARM- Students from royal school of vetinery studies spend 5 years training here. Training farm is used for curing sick animals and testing medicines. Research is also done in tropical vetinery medicine centre. FORESTRY COMMISSION NORTHERN RESEARCH STATION AT BUSH ESTATE. Seedlings are grown in nurseries to be sent to other parts of the country when they are two years old.The Sitka Spruce and Lodge Pole Pine are the most common trees grown but trees form other countries can be found also.In the genetics branch,experiments
